snippet: Read the full report by the Federal Bureau of Investigation on a 22-month inquiry concerning Vincent Raucci that contained claims of criminal behavior, including drug use. Mr. Raucci retired in 1996.
lead_paragraph: Read the full report by the Federal Bureau of Investigation on a 22-month inquiry concerning Vincent Raucci that contained claims of criminal behavior, including drug use. Mr. Raucci retired in 1996.

headline.main: F.B.I. Report on Detective in New Haven Case
